pchoy wrote:
> Is there a way to get the seed URL from any processor? For example, I'd 
> like to get the seed URL at anytime from within an extractor, or 
> fecher, etc. 

*IF* you enabled the expert 'source-tag-seeds' setting, seed URIs will 
be marked up with their own URI in a way that every URI discovered from 
them inherits. (If URIs are reachable from many seeds, the first 
discovered will be applied -- which is not necessarily the shortest path.)

There's an example of accessing this tag on lines 96-98 of 
UriProcessingFormatter.java:

http://crawler.archive.org/xref/org/archive/crawler/io/UriProcessingFormatter.html#96

         String sourceTag = curi.containsKey(A_SOURCE_TAG)
                 ? curi.getString(A_SOURCE_TAG)
                 : null;

- Gordon @ IA
